description:
Ride in the rain with peace of mind, knowing your gear will remain dry. The Monsoon Onceanweave panniers are highly waterproof and spacious, with plenty of reflective elements and light attachments to ensure you stay visible. Easy on-off hardware is a breeze to use when coming and going.

  • Polyurethane-coated Oceanweave® fabric made with reclaimed fishnets
  • Hydracore® liner provides IPX5 waterproofness
  • Internal backboard keeps the pannier's shape
  • Rixen & Kaul® attachment system fits rails 6 to 16mm
  • Webbing tie-downs accommodate a lock or other gear
  • Reflective accents and light loops on both sides
  • Webbing carry handles and D-rings for attaching your own shoulder strap
name: Axiom Monsoon Oceanweave P32+ Panniers
